div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

br.span: CHECK YOUR SCHOOL SITE FOR INFORMATION
Need assistance? For curriculum questions, contact your teacher. For technical support, contact elearningday@smcsc.com.

img.title: elearning
img.style: color: rgb(255, 0, 0); font-size: 28px; width: 100px; height: 75px; float: right;

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;
p.img: Welcome to the South Madison Community School Corporation website. Thank you for your interest in the school district, where it is our goal to serve you. South Madison's objective is to provide you with meaningful and helpful information regarding the school system through this website. Your questions and feedback are encouraged and welcomed.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;
margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;

div.p: South Madison Community Schools are committed to providing a challenging curriculum, skilled instructors, and a learning environment that responds to individual student academic needs. Administrators and teachers set rigorous and challenging expectations for learning and support students to achieve high standards. The district continues to focus on student achievement with the goal of becoming one of Indiana's highest performing school districts.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;
margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;

div.p: South Madison's success directly connects to a dedicated, highly qualified staff; active and strong parental involvement; and a supportive and generous community. If you have not yet become involved in the education of your child or the children of this community, I encourage you to do so. Ensuring that children receive the guidance and encouragement they need to be successful are among the most important and rewarding things we will ever do. Together we can and do make a difference in the lives of children each and every day.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;
margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;

div.p: I am excited about the opportunities that lie ahead for South Madison Community School Corporation. By combining our efforts, we can provide the best educational experiences possible for the students of this school district.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;
margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: asap-regular-webfont, sans-serif;
